As a programmer who also plays, this was extraordinarily frustrating and vague.  Thanks for the hard work, but I want the details.  

What was the bug?  Is it all just scripting?  Were buffers being overwritten?  Were semaphores not deployed correctly?  Were threads marching over each other?  Did someone misuse a union?  Was the byte alignment in two structures not the same?  What happened?!

Laughed when I read "that sinking feeling when you realize that it's every champion"

I can imagine the horror of that thought
TL:DR, turn out over half the champs can use this bug so they disable Ranked.
